== Thomattuchal (627323) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Thomattuchal is a village in the [[Sulthanbathery]] taluka of [[Wayanad]] district with an area of 3485 hectares and harbouring 4392 households with total population of 17984 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kalpetta]] is at a distance of 31 km. Male population is 8802 and female population is 9182. Scheduled Caste Population is 383 and Scheduled Tribes population is 2489. Census Location Code of the village is 627323<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate male population: 7424 (84.34%)
* Literate female population: 7296 (79.46%)
